name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Martin DEEMER, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 446 Middle District Allocatur Docket 1995

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Martin DEEMER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 26th day of February, 1996, allocatur is granted in the above-captioned matter limited to the question of whether, by reason of having become a fugitive, petitioner waived his appeal rights. Oral argument is also granted in this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
671 A.2d 688
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Martin DEEMER, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 26, 1996.
